order_tracking.question: When will I receive my order?
order_tracking.answer: Estimated delivery date provided at order placement. Track from your account or guest link in emails.

shipping_changes.question: Can I change the shipping method?
shipping_changes.answer: Shipping method cannot be changed after purchase completion.

delivery_issues.question: What happens if my order cannot be delivered?
delivery_issues.answer: Contact us if absent during home delivery - we will verify with courier.

order_delays.question: Can my order be delayed?
order_delays.answer: If unable to deliver on estimated date, email sent with new delivery date in order details.

missing_delivered_order.question: Order shows delivered but I haven't received it. What can I do?
missing_delivered_order.answer: Contact Customer Service for delivery issues. May need to complete DOR document.

refund_confirmation_email.question: Why haven't I received my refund confirmation email?
refund_confirmation_email.answer: Check email address linked to purchase is correct. Drop point returns processed when goods arrive at premises.
troubleshooting: drop point returns take longer to process

lost_payment_card.question: I no longer have the card I used to make the purchase. How will I receive my refund?
lost_payment_card.answer: Refunds processed to same payment method. Contact your bank for assistance with lost cards.

lost_gift_card.question: I no longer have the gift card I used to pay. Where will I receive my refund?

answer.online_purchase: virtual copy of card with updated balance sent via email
answer.store_purchase: store staff issues refund on Voucher or Gift Card

partial_refund.question: Why have I received a partial refund for my return?
partial_refund.answer: Items sent in multiple boxes processed at different times. Each return confirmed by separate email.
partial_refund.option: contact customer service for detailed review

general_support.document_access: DOR document available via provided link
